scene_description_enriched: A figure, likely a saint or a royal personage, is depicted holding a staff or scepter in their left hand and raising their right hand in a gesture of blessing or teaching. The figure wears a crown or elaborate headdress and a richly decorated garment. To the left, a banner with illegible text is unfurled. The scene is framed by architectural elements suggesting an interior or a niche, with decorative patterns and what appear to be arches.
